name: Explore Ottawa
description:
Explore Ottawa provides a limited tour of major sites in the capital city of Canada, Ottawa. Originally created as a wordpress blog: exploreottawa.wordpress.com; it got a second chance at life in the form of a Twine. Explore Ottawa examines the concept of national narratives, and who forms them.

Project completed for Dr. Shawn Graham's HIST 3812: Digital History at Carleton University; November 2014.
